Package ast.dirs

Class Rdirs

java.lang.Object
ast.dirs.Rdirs
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDirs, Serializable
public class Rdirs extends Object implements IDirs, Serializable
Represents a recursive direction component in a sensor network. This class encapsulates a direction and allows for recursive aggregation of directions from other direction components, facilitating the composition of multiple directional evaluations into a single unified set. It implements IDirs to comply with the system's requirements for handling directional data and is marked as Serializable for distribution across different components in a network.

      public Rdirs(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.Direction direction, IDirs dirs)
      Constructs a new Rdirs instance with a specified direction and a nested direction component.
      Parameters:
      direction - The fixed direction that this instance will primarily represent.
      dirs - Another direction component which this instance will use to aggregate additional directions.

  • Method Details

    • eval

      public Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.Direction> eval()
      Evaluates and returns a set containing both the primary direction of this instance and any directions derived from the nested direction component. This method facilitates complex directional evaluations where multiple sources of directional data need to be considered and unified.
      Specified by:
      eval in interface IDirs
      Returns:
      A set of Direction objects representing the aggregated directions from this instance and its nested component.
